scripts.deploy:prod: yarn build && export AWS_PROFILE=default && sls -s prod deploy
scripts.deploy: yarn build && export AWS_PROFILE=default && yes | sls deploy  && yarn build:cleanup
scripts.deploy:function: yarn build && export AWS_PROFILE=default && sls deploy function
scripts.deploy:prod:function: yarn build && export AWS_PROFILE=default && sls -s prod deploy function
